meanings.sent1: The nondiscount items were already marked at the lowest price.
meanings.sent2: She purchased the nondiscount shoes because they were already on sale.
meanings.sent3: The nondiscount bananas were so expensive, they must have been made of gold!
meanings.sent4: Her nondiscount attitude towards money made her a savvy shopper.
meanings.sent5: The nondiscount label on the product meant it was full price and not on sale.

meanings.definition: Not subject to a reduction in price.
meanings.sent1: The nondiscount items were always the same price, no matter what.
meanings.sent2: He preferred to buy nondiscount electronics to ensure quality.
meanings.sent3: The nondiscount car was a steal because it never went on sale!
meanings.sent4: Her nondiscount resolve to save money paid off in the long run.
meanings.sent5: The nondiscount policy meant customers paid full price for all items.
